ItemAttributes.name: Data Type
ItemAttributes.description: The data type of the historical data (VT_I4, VT_UI4, BT_R4 or VT_BSTR).

ItemAttributes.name: Stepped
ItemAttributes.description: True if the historical data value may be interpolated.  False for enumerations and string values.

ItemAttributes.name: ItemID
ItemAttributes.description: The Item ID as provided to the DeltaV Continuous Historian.

ItemAttributes.name: Max Time Interval
ItemAttributes.description: The minimum interval between data values in the data set.

ItemAttributes.name: Min Time Interval
ItemAttributes.description: The maximum interval between data values in the data set.

ItemAttributes.name: Exception Deviation
ItemAttributes.description: The minimum amount the data value must change to add a new sample to the data set.

ItemAttributes.name: Eng 100%
ItemAttributes.description: Current DeltaV EU 100% of Scale Value

ItemAttributes.name: Eng 0%
ItemAttributes.description: Current DeltaV EU 0% of Scale Value
